short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Generate smart comments for YouTube videos

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The EasyComment extension is a Chrome add-on designed to help users quickly generate and post smart comments on YouTube videos based on a star rating system.
Features:
Star Rating System: Users can rate videos.
Comment Generation: Automatically generates comments based on the selected rating.
Preview and Confirm: Users can preview the generated comment before posting it.
YouTube Integration: Ensures that comments are only posted on YouTube video pages.
This extension allows users to easily and quickly post positive and engaging comments on their favorite videos.
